snippet: The Federal Reserve Bank of New York conferred with regulators about the problems and recommended reforms, but it failed to stop the illegal activity, which persisted through 2009.
abstract: The Federal Reserve Bank of New York conferred with regulators about the problems and recommended reforms, but it failed to stop the illegal activity, which persisted through 2009.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and BEN PROTESS

headline.main: New York Fed Knew of False Barclays Reports on Rates
